bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Software Quality Assurance Plans
IEEE Standard for Software Quality Assurance Plans

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Superseded Uniform minimum acceptable requirements for the preparation and content of Software Quality Assurance Plans (SQAPs) are provided. The standard also provides a standard against which such plans can be compared and assessed. It applies to the development and maintenance of critical software. For noncritical software, or for software already developed, a subset of the requirements of this standard may be applied.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: ANSI/ IEEE Std 730-1984 (Revision of ANSI/ IEEE Std 730-1981)
